name: homepage
description: Homepage is a customizable, YAML driven dashboard for homelab services. It supports widgets for system stats, media libraries, monitoring tools and dynamic service discovery, serving as a central control panel for your infrastructure.
features: YAML Configuration: Define your entire dashboard layout and services in simple YAML files.
Service Widgets: Display real-time data from Sonarr, Radarr, Plex, and 100+ other services.
Docker Integration: Automatically discover and monitor Docker containers on your system.
System Stats: Show CPU, memory, disk usage, and network statistics.
Kubernetes Support: Monitor pods, deployments, and cluster resources.
Custom API Widgets: Create widgets for any service with a REST API.
Bookmarks: Organize frequently accessed links in customizable bookmark groups.
Search Integration: Add search bars for Google, DuckDuckGo, or custom search engines.
